# Select PR Template

> [!IMPORTANT]
> **Please choose a template before you start writing.**
> Clicking a link below will refresh the page and any unsaved text will be lost.

> - [Localization / Translation](?template=localization.md)

---

_If you don't select a template, please fill out the PR details manually._
